metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20363 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
LibRaw::raw2image in libraw_cxx.cpp in LibRaw 0.19.1 has a NULL pointerdereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20363` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
libraw15 - 0.17.1-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.1-1ubuntu0.5').
ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
